name: GetAddressByPostalCode
description:
Retrieves address information for a given postal code and country.

This request can be used to implement auto complete functionality when a customer needs to fill in an address.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

countryCode.description: Three letter country code refering to the `postalCode` field.
